name: Go Fly Maui LLC
about: Go Fly Maui LLC is Maui's premier helicopter flight training and aerial photography company. We offer private, doors-off photo flights and customized flight lessons, allowing students to experience the thrill of flying over Maui's stunning scenery. Our services include discovery flights, private pilot licenses, commercial licenses, instrument ratings, and drone pilot certification. We also provide aerial photography academy programs and unique helicopter charter services. With a focus on personalized, flexible training, we help aspiring pilots and photographers achieve their goals in a fun and professional environment. Whether you're a visitor or a local, Go Fly Maui is dedicated to making your flying experience unforgettable.
services:
